activities: Employee (and ex-employee) personal information received in the U.S. from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland, specifically in: (1) an on-line human resources database, known as the Global Human Resources Management System ("GHRMS"); (2) certain on-line databases that facilitate internal employment, performance, training, “travel and entertainment” expense processing, talent and succession management; (3) information collected during Caterpillar's Code of Conduct Assessment process; (4) enterprise resource planning systems used for manufacturing and finance; and (5) certain technology infrastructure systems that may collect personal information. This certification pertains specifically and solely to personal information transferred to the U.S. from the E.U., E.E.A. and Switzerland to these systems. A complete list of these systems is maintained by Caterpillar and is available internally at the Human Services Division privacy intranet site.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employee (and ex-employee) personal information received in the U.S. from the E.U./E.E.A./Switzerland in GHRMS and certain other systems as further described in Caterpillar’s Safe Harbor certification.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protecetion and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
